description: This file defines a React-like component called 'RecipeDetail' using the LightningJS framework, responsible for rendering the detailed view of a recipe including its image, title, ingredients, steps, and a close button.

methods.name: ready
methods.description: Lifecycle hook that initializes the component's state with data from the 'recipe' prop when the component is ready.

methods.name: back
methods.description: Handles the action to close the detail view by transitioning the opacity and invoking an optional callback.

methods.name: enter
methods.description: Triggers the back method, effectively closing the component.
